args:
Determine whether this NHTSA investigation summary is relevant to the Washington Post. Return `{"result": true}` or `{"result": false}`
content: Control Arm May Crack Subframe During Installation

ZF North America, Inc. (ZF) is recalling certain Lemförder track control arms with part number 38526 01, and TRW track control arms with part number JTC 1619.  The bush inner sleeve may be too short, which can cause excessive compression of the track control arm and crack the subframe during installation.A cracked subframe may damage the front axle carrier and cause a loss of vehicle handling and control, increasing the risk of a crash.

Number of Units Affected: 275.0
